title: Aromatherapy & Natural Care Products
description: Heliotrope has the best natural care products and aromatherapy, all organic and hand-made, in San Francisco. Treat yourself, or find the perfect gift in our online store.
cleaned_text: Natural, fresh and personalized skin care - welcome to Heliotrope San Francisco. For over ten years, Heliotrope San Francisco has dependably created high-quality, all-natural products - made in Northern California in small batches - using simple, organic ingredients. Founder Jonathan Plotzker-Kelly's experience in product development and his work with small chemists throughout the Bay Area have brought natural, well-made, and fragrance-free skin care to the market. We believe that people deserve to feel great in their skin. We share our enthusiasm about natural skin care by formulating products that soothe, moisturize and protect, and by using ingredients with the most efficacy - to heal and nourish the skin. We offer natural, healing skin care for men and women without synthetic perfumes or artificial colors, and consult with each client to create custom, individualized aromatherapy blends, using all-natural, undiluted essential oils. Visit Heliotrope in SF, Oakland, or shop online; enjoy customized aromatherapy blends, personal health products and useful, well-designed accessories. Enjoy the most simple, effective blends of natural ingredients, or explore customizing our fragrance-free products.
